panels.description: 电池组输入或输出的电量盈余或不足。正值表示给电池充电，负值表示电池放电。
panels.title: 电池差分

properties.value: 最大消耗(电网启动最小功率)

panels.description: 显示电网 $circuit 的运行地图

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
data ->> 'Name' as "建筑",
data ->'PowerInfo' ->> 'CircuitGroupID' as "电网",
data ->> 'Recipe' as "配方",
(data -> 'location' ->> 'x')::NUMERIC/100 as "x坐标",
(data -> 'location' ->> 'y')::NUMERIC/100 as "y坐标",
(data -> 'location' ->> 'z')::NUMERIC/100 as "z坐标",
(((data -> 'location' ->> 'x')::NUMERIC + 375000) * 0.0000001015) as longitude,
(((data -> 'location' ->> 'y')::NUMERIC + 375000) * -0.0000001172) as latitude
from cache where metric in ('factory', 'extractor')
and (data -> 'PowerInfo' ->> 'CircuitGroupID')::numeric = $circuit
and url = '$server'
and session_name = '$session'

panels.title: 电网 $circuit 地图

panels.description: 每个电网的建筑物数量

targets.rawSql:
select 
data -> 'PowerInfo' ->> 'CircuitGroupID' as "电网",
count(*) as "建筑总数"
from cache where metric in ('factory', 'extractor')
and url = '$server'
and session_name = '$session'
group by "电网"
order by "建筑总数"

panels.title: 电网和建筑总数
